content:
The datastore model of the case could look something like this:
```python
from google.cloud import ndb

class Case(ndb.Model):
    created_by = ndb.StringProperty(required=True)
    created_on = ndb.DateTimeProperty(auto_now_add=True)
    updated_on = ndb.DateTimeProperty(auto_now=True)
    name = ndb.StringProperty(required=True)
    description = ndb.TextProperty()
    images = ndb.JsonProperty(required=True) # a list of dictionaries containing image urls and metadata
    status = ndb.StringProperty(choices=['open', 'closed'], default='open')
```
This model includes information about the creator of the case, the creation and update times, the name and description of the case, the images associated with the case, and the status of the case (open or closed). The `images` property is a JSON serialized list of dictionaries containing information about each image associated with the case, including the URL and any relevant metadata.
